summary.Title: Halal butcher for chicken poultry near Nibe
summary.JobHeadline: Halal butcher for chicken poultry near Nibe
summary.Presentation:
The Job
You will join a professional and energetic team with a focus on high quality. Your tasks will include working in the slaughterhouse, filleting chickens, and packaging chicken in production.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Halal butcher for chicken poultry near Nibe
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
The Job

You will join a professional and energetic team with a focus on high quality. Your tasks will include working in the slaughterhouse, filleting chickens, and packaging chicken in production.

Your Profile

It is important that you are hardworking and reliable and that you thrive with both routine tasks and a fast pace. It is an advantage if you have experience with slaughtering. Additionally, it is important that you have respect for the quality products being handled. This is a slaughterhouse that performs various forms of slaughtering, where the tasks include halal slaughtering of chickens.

Our Expectations of You:
  • You are energetic and proactive, and enjoy an active workday
  • You are comfortable working at night
  • You have good teamwork skills
  • Preferably, you have experience with halal slaughtering - but it is not a requirement
  • You are punctual and reliable
  • You are motivated and engaged in your tasks
Working Hours

There are available shifts:

  • Monday, Wednesday, and Friday between 02:15 AM - 02:15 PM.
Does this sound like something for you?

Click on 'Apply for the job' to submit your application. If you do not already have a profile with Moment, you will be asked to create one as the first step in the application process.

We look forward to hearing from you.
